section.title: CPU Models
section.para: The cpu-models configuration object describes how CPUs are assigned for use by service components such as nova (for VMs) and Open vSwitch (for DPDK), and whether or not those CPUs are isolated from the general kernel SMP balancing and scheduling algorithms. It also describes the number of vCPUs for virtual machine servers.
